snippet.title: The Veil of the Forgotten - Now available trailer ENGLISH
snippet.description:
It's getting dark on the isle... how fun is that? 🙊
The Veil of the Forgotten is now available on Steam!

Shop now!
Steam link:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/3240780/The_veil_of_the_forgotten
